comments.body: Please add more context and information to the post!

context :- SpaceBasic is a widely implemented digital hostel management in PES university , last night all students got a mail threatening that student info whould be leaked is they didnt stop using the app , currently after enquire with warden we dont know who exactly did it , but according to my knowledge the pes management are looking into this .
One more step ahead, what if the hacker finds Broken Access control vulnerability and is able to alter someone's GPA, that'll be some cool shit .
Some people would benefit with a better GPA lol
